description: Made for fast, dynamic, done-in-a-day mountaineering ascents, this wind-resistant midlayer from the Eiger Speed collection uses technical materials and precise body mapping to provide the ultimate in temperature regulation and moisture management. With quick-access outer pockets, a fitted hood for those gusty peaks, and a high-stretch, fully articulated fit for unrestricted movement when things get vertical, you’ll be reaching new heights in no time. Ready to claim your next personal best?
name: Mammut Eiger Speed ML Hybrid Hooded Jacket - Mens

specs.value: polyamide-elastane woven with pure tag by HeiQ
4 Way Stretch Double Weave Dobby Stormfleece fabric
